title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: When the workbench is restarted, the recently used files (MRU list) are not displayed in the File menu.
EB: The recently used files (MRU list) should be displayed in the File menu even after restarting the workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shutdown the workbench. 
4. Restart the workbench and check the File menu to see if the recently used files are displayed.
